title: water_pump_no_flow_observed
summary: Water pump operation check recorded with no water flow observed.
description: A pump power connection and related setup are shown. The recorded event notes that the pump was turned on and water did not flow, with insufficient delivery pressure reported.

event.action: checked pump operation and observed no water flow; prepared to unplug power

reference_context.note: Linked to pump preparation and house water tank observation sequence.

external_reference.note: External image reference for independent verification.
